description:
Part 1: Jun`ichi and Haruka visit a family restaurant together; Jun`ichi is worried what his classmate Kaoru might think as she`s a waitress in this restaurant. After Jun`ichi confirmed he`s okay with sweet food, Haruka orders the Shining Lovers Parfait which she want to eat together.
Part 2: Christmas is near. As Kaoru said she has to work today, Jun`ichi is heading home alone but then decides to take a detour to the book shop. On the way he runs across a stall where a girl in a sexy Santa outfit sells Christmas cakes - and it`s Kaoru! Jun`ichi is entranced by Kaoru`s costume, but when he`s caught looking at her thighs she imposes a penalty for his misbehavior.
Part 3: It`s early December; Jun`ichi is sitting all alone at home on his birthday. Then the doorbell rings: It`s Sae-chan, and she`s not looking for her classmate Miya but for her "instructor". And she even brought a present for the boy.

titles.title: Morishima Haruka Chapter / Tanamachi Kaoru Chapter / Nakata Sae Chapter
Morishima Haruka Hen / Tanamachi Kaoru Hen / Nakata Sae Hen
森島はるか編 / 棚町薫編 / 中多紗江編
모리시마 하루카 편 / 타나마치 카오루 편 / 나카타 사에 편
